articles.content: India and Australia, by far, have been the two best Test sides in the ongoing World Test Championship cycle and it seems only fitting that they play the final and the most anticipating Test series of… [+2301 chars]

articles.title: "It is my second home" - Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni reveals which other national team he would like to coach - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Argentina boss Lionel Scaloni has said that he would gladly take charge of the Spanish national team if an opportunity presented itself, saying that Spain is his second home.
articles.content:
